description: Premni Anushan and two others Vs Minister of Lands and Parliamentary Reforms. and Three Others - before Hon. Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J

keywords: Locus standi to maintain a writ application. -Lack of uberrima fides of the petitioner. -Extraordinary nature of remedies in writs. -Non- disclosure of material facts. -Misrepresentation of facts by the petitioner in a writ application
